Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Further investigation of photovoltaic performances indicates all devices present high V oc because of the relatively deep HOMO energy levels of these polymers , and the highest PCE of 5.05% was achieved based on PIDT-C12NT .

Let's think step by step.

| PCE |

The Property Name entities in the paragraph are:

1. V oc (open-circuit voltage)
2. PCE (power conversion efficiency)
3. HOMO (highest occupied molecular orbital)

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| V oc |

The only valid entity that clearly refers to a material property in the given paragraph is:

1. V oc (open-circuit voltage)

The other mentioned entities, PCE and HOMO, are not directly related to material properties and thus are not included in the list.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Further investigation of photovoltaic performances indicates all devices present high V oc because of the relatively deep HOMO energy levels of these polymers , and the highest PCE of 5.05% was achieved based on PIDT-C12NT .

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| V oc |
| PCE |
| HOMO energy levels |
| PIDT-C12NT |

Explanation:

* V oc (open-circuit voltage) is a property value that describes the maximum voltage that a solar cell can produce when it is not connected to a load.
* PCE (power conversion efficiency) is a property value that describes the efficiency of a solar cell in converting sunlight into electrical power.
* HOMO (highest occupied molecular orbital) energy levels are property values that describe the energy levels of a molecule.
* PIDT-C12NT is a specific type of polymer that has a high PCE of 5.05%.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| V oc |
| PCE |

Explanation:

* V oc (open-circuit voltage) is a property value that describes the maximum voltage that a solar cell can produce when it is not connected to a load.
* PCE (power conversion efficiency) is a property value that describes the efficiency of a solar cell in converting sunlight into electrical power.

The following entities do not clearly refer to the value of a material property:

* HOMO energy levels (not a material property)
* PIDT-C12NT (a specific type of polymer, not a property value)
